concept.title: Time Off and Allowances
concept.shortdesc: The Time Off and Allowances feature is a redesigned experience for time off management. It enables employees to view real-time and forecasted balances and to easily request time off.

conbody.p: Time Off and Allowances provides many capabilities by role.

strow.stentry: Create a request for each policy type and view balances
Assign Policy Groups and Holiday calendars to team members
Define blackout dates and coverage requirements by job
Edit or cancel pending existing requests
Create a request on behalf of an employee, approve requests, and view history
Create Holiday calendars, Custom calendars, and policy types
View their schedule and timesheet to see requests made in advance

conbody.p: If managers have permission, they can define blackout dates and coverage requirements for their team.
When employees request time off, the Time feature verifies the request and communicates a yes or no decision to the Time Off and Allowances feature.
